lexUnit.name: glance.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: take a brief or hurried look.

sentence.text: A list was always made on these occasions and Pascoe glanced quickly down it .
He glanced about cautiously and lowered his voice even further .
He glanced across at the strange boy again .
After taking a sip he glanced across to where she was sitting .
He glanced across at her , then back at the road .
Now he did glance behind , to see the car following steadily .
She risked glancing behind .
She flung open the door of the Document Examination room and glanced inside .
Passing Michelle 's bedroom door that morning , he 'd glanced inside .
She glanced over one shoulder .
He glanced nervously about him but it was 2. a.m. and Dobson and the other yobs had long gone .
Tuppe glanced about the place .
He glanced across he canal to the swimming animals .
He glanced across the table , saw me smiling , interpreted my thought and gave me a slow ironic blink .
She glanced hesitantly at the door .
Melanie glanced at him in surprise but his face was expressionless , living stone .
He glanced at me sideways , smiling .
She glanced hastily behind her but , as in the kitchen , there was no obvious hiding place .
The young man glanced behind himself dubiously , into the interior .
Madge glanced behind Lily to see that the dressing room door was shut .
He did n't answer and drank the rest of his lemonade in silence , glancing between me and Lucy .

Ronni found herself glancing beyond his broad shoulders to the half-shuttered , sumptuously furnished room beyond , with its rug-strewn floor , picture-covered walls and vast , deeply unsettling canopied bed .
` I wo n't need to do that , " he said , glancing briefly beyond Zambia 's shoulder at the wall behind .
` What the hell have you been up to ? " she demanded , glancing down the road as if she expected Herbie Connors to appear on his bike .
Lucinda glanced from Vi to Chief Wren Pillmoor , wondering who would be the victor .
A second later he was in the doorway , glancing from one to the other in concern .
Eleanor glanced from side to side and then said in a low voice , “ It 's all right … what I told you about . ”
She said the words with such bitterness that Tempy glanced inquisitively from the window .
He seemed to be talking to himself , and as he drew level he glanced suddenly in her direction .
She half tumbled down the stairs , and Johnny , hearing the sound of her rapid descent , glanced upwards in the direction of the landing .
He glanced briefly in the mirror again .
If you glance inside the average modern book you will clearly see the mull or tape strips under this paste-down ( as compared with the free endpaper ) .
Lucy glanced into a couple of the rooms as they passed .
Jessica glanced into her face .
Penelope glanced over Ianthe 's shoulder through the open door of the dining room .
Lisa glanced past him .
He glanced cautiously round the graveyard .
She glanced anxiously round the treatment area .
Spend five or ten minutes glancing through the book .
Seven-thirty came and she glanced through the curtains to see if she could see your car drawing up .
You keep glancing to the bathroom door .
Embarrassed , he glanced to his left .
She glanced apologetically to Madge and her plump face creased into a smile .
As they passed the silent Salvation Inn , Yanto glanced to the left at the Murchison house .
Peach glanced desperately towards the kitchen window .
I glance out of the corner of my eye towards Dixie .
She glanced out of the window into the dark as the pilot entered the cabin .

Glancing from beneath her lashes , Lindsey studied his profile , and found it unnerving , or perhaps it was simply that the confining space of the small car did n't allow much distance between driver and passenger .
Angus glanced along the table at his wife sitting with eyes downcast .
Maria glanced around the room with her scared eyes .
Shiona glanced away , her eyes dropping to her lap .
He glanced back secretively over his shoulder at the other three who were talking and paying no attention to him .
Cally had reached the frontdoor and she glanced back up at him before opening it .
He glanced down the codings listed on the last of the semi-opaque sheets and imprinted his authorisation .
She glanced down again at her left arm .
Caroline frowned as she glanced out the window .
She glanced to where the telephone , smugly silent , rested upon a shelf .
Before leaving the counter Maggie glanced to where the tall one was sitting .
Virginia glanced ruefully down at her own outfit .
Fiona glanced off to one side a couple of times .
He glanced over at the plates of smoked salmon .
